TR_LD_TODAY.context: TODAY is used to label a button and mainly for testing3

TR_LD_WEEK.context: WEEK is used to label a button on the Detail for testing 3

TR_LD_PROJECT_ERROR.string: Error al cargar la información de configuración.
TR_LD_PROJECT_ERROR.context: Phrase is displayed when the project configuration file cannot be loaded, either to not existing to has an error. This is displayed on a line by itself.
